column2: I would say the weakest thing is probably their sauce and their sides.  Because  I live so close
column4: and use my own bbq sauce at home
column5: either stubbs/salt licks sauce.  The sides i always get the roasted okra
column6: the mac & cheese is only ok
column7: and nothing else catches my eye.  The meats
column12: tacos.  The meats were good. highlights are brisket and beef ribs as others have pointed out.  Good salty crust
column16: juicy.  Pretty much all the good things you want in BBQ is here.  (have not been to Franklins)
